amendment.description: An amendment numbered 42 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to prohibit the use of funds to pay the salary and expenses of DHS Assistant Secretary for Counter Terrorism and Threat Prevention Samantha Vinograd.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 265 (Roll no. 449).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 265 (Roll no. 449).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
